name: PHYS 100 D100
prerequisites: BC Pre-Calculus 12 (or equivalent) or MATH 100, with a minimum grade of C-. BC Physics 11 (or equivalent) is recommended.

name: PHYS 101 D100
prerequisites: BC Principles of Physics 12 or PHYS 100 or equivalent, with a minimum grade of C-. This prerequisite may be waived, at the discretion of the department, as determined by the student's performance on a regularly scheduled PHYS 100 final exam. Please consult the physics advisor for further details. Corequisite: MATH 150 or 151 or 154 or 157; BISC 100 or 101 or 102. Recommended Corequisite: PHYS 132.

name: PHYS 102 D100
prerequisites: PHYS 101 or 120 or 125 or 140; MATH 150 or 151 or 154 or 157; both with a minimum grade of C-. Corequisite: BISC 100 or 101 or 102. Recommended Corequisites: MATH 152, 155 or 158; PHYS 133.

name: PHYS 120 D100
prerequisites: BC Principles of Physics 12 or PHYS 100 or equivalent, with a minimum grade of C-. This prerequisite may be waived, at the discretion of the department, as determined by the student's performance on a regularly scheduled PHYS 100 final exam. Please consult the physics advisor for further details. Corequisite: MATH 150 or 151 or 154. Recommended Corequisite: PHYS 132.

name: PHYS 125 D100
prerequisites: Permission of the department. Corequisite: MATH 151. Recommended Corequisite: PHYS 132.

name: PHYS 140 D100
prerequisites: BC Principles of Physics 12, or PHYS 100 or equivalent, with a minimum grade of C-. Corequisite: MATH 150 or 151 or 154.

name: PHYS 201 D100
prerequisites: PHYS 121 or PHYS 126 or PHYS 141, with a minimum grade of C-, or PHYS 102 with a minimum grade of B.

name: PHYS 233 D100
prerequisites: PHYS 133 or PHYS 141 or ENSC 120, with a minimum grade of C-. Recommended Prerequisite: CMPT 120.

name: PHYS 255 D100
prerequisites: PHYS 126 or PHYS 121 or PHYS 141, with a minimum grade of C-, or PHYS 102 with a minimum grade of B. Corequisite: MATH 251; MATH 232 or MATH 240. Recommended Corequisite: MATH 260 or MATH 310.

name: PHYS 335 D100
prerequisites: Completion of 30 units, with a minimum GPA of 2.75 in the physics program. Students should apply to the department at least one term in advance.

name: PHYS 336 D100
prerequisites: PHYS 335 followed by 12 units. A minimum cumulative GPA of 2.75. Students should apply to the department at least one term in advance.

name: PHYS 344 D100
prerequisites: PHYS 121 or PHYS 126 or PHYS 141 (or PHYS 102 with a minimum grade of B); MATH 251; both with a minimum grade of C-.

name: PHYS 384 D100
prerequisites: MATH 252 or 254; MATH 260 or MATH 310; PHYS 211; PHYS 255 or ENSC 320. All prerequisite courses require a minimum grade of C-.

name: PHYS 385 D100
prerequisites: MATH 251; MATH 260; PHYS 255 or ENSC 380; PHYS 285 or CHEM 260. All prerequisite courses require a minimum grade of C-. Recommended Prerequisite: PHYS 211.

name: PHYS 413 D100
prerequisites: PHYS 384 or permission of the department. Non-physics majors may enter with MATH 252; MATH 260 or MATH 310; PHYS 211. All prerequisite courses require a minimum grade of C-.

name: PHYS 421 D100
prerequisites: PHYS 321 (no substitution); PHYS 255 or ENSC 380; both with a minimum grade of C-.

name: PHYS 432 D100
prerequisites: All students interested in taking this course must consult with their faculty supervisor regarding prerequisites.

name: PHYS 435 D100
prerequisites: PHYS 336 and 60 units with a minimum cumulative GPA of 2.75.

name: PHYS 436 D100
prerequisites: PHYS 435 followed by 12 units. A minimum cumulative GPA of 2.75.

name: PHYS 437 D100
prerequisites: PHYS 436 and a minimum cumulative GPA of 2.75. Students should apply to the department at least one term in advance.

name: PHYS 455 D200
prerequisites: PHYS 321 with a minimum grade of C-. Corequisite: PHYS 385.

name: PHYS 465 D100
prerequisites: PHYS 385 or CHEM 364, with a minimum grade of C-.

name: PHYS 484 D100
prerequisites: PHYS 384 with a minimum grade of C- or permission of the department.

name: PHYS 492 D200
prerequisites: Permission of the department.

name: PHYS 810 G100
prerequisites: PHYS 415, or equivalent.

name: PHYS 813 G100
prerequisites: PHYS 384 or permission of the department.

name: PHYS 822 G100
prerequisites: PHYS 421 or equivalent.

name: PHYS 855 G200
prerequisites: Permission of the instructor.
